subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: Who were the major tribes of ancient Rajasthan?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान के मुख्य जनजातियाँ कौन थीं?
explanation_en: Gurjars, Rajputs, and Meenas were the major tribes of ancient Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: गुर्जर, राजपूत, और मीणा प्राचीन राजस्थान की मुख्य जनजातियाँ थीं।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: Which of the following was a major festival of ancient Rajasthan?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान का मुख्य त्योहार कौन सा था?
explanation_en: Navratri was a major festival of ancient Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: नवरात्रि प्राचीन राजस्थान का मुख्य त्योहार था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: What was the main occupation of the people of ancient Mewar?
question_hi: प्राचीन मेवाड़ के लोगों का मुख्य व्यवसाय क्या था?
explanation_en: The people of ancient Mewar were mainly craftsmen.
explanation_hi: प्राचीन मेवाड़ के लोगों का मुख्य व्यवसाय कला कारीगरी था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: Who was the founder of the Gurjara-Pratihara dynasty?
question_hi: गुर्जर-प्रतिहार वंश के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Nagabhata I was the founder of the Gurjara-Pratihara dynasty.
explanation_hi: नागभट्ट I गुर्जर-प्रतिहार वंश के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: What was the name of the ancient Rajput kingdom that ruled over Marwar?
question_hi: जो प्राचीन राजपूत राज्य ने मरवाड़ पर शासन किया था, उसका नाम क्या था?
explanation_en: Marwar was the ancient Rajput kingdom that ruled over Marwar.
explanation_hi: मरवाड़ प्राचीन राजपूत राज्य था जो मरवाड़ पर शासन करता था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: Which of the following was a major contribution of the Meena community to ancient Rajasthan?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान में मीना समुदाय का मुख्य योगदान क्या था?
explanation_en: The Meena community made a significant contribution to the craftsmanship of ancient Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: मीना समुदाय ने प्राचीन राजस्थान की कला कारीगरी में महत्वपूर्ण योगदान दिया।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: What was the name of the ancient Jain temple located in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में स्थित प्राचीन जैन मंदिर का नाम क्या था?
explanation_en: The Dilwara Temple is a famous ancient Jain temple located in Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: दिलवाड़ा मंदिर राजस्थान में स्थित प्रसिद्ध प्राचीन जैन मंदिर है।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: Who was the famous queen of ancient Mewar?
question_hi: प्राचीन मेवाड़ की प्रसिद्ध रानी कौन थी?
explanation_en: Rani Padmini was a famous queen of ancient Mewar.
explanation_hi: रानी पद्मिनी प्राचीन मेवाड़ की प्रसिद्ध रानी थीं।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: What was the name of the ancient trade route that passed through Rajasthan?
question_hi: जो प्राचीन व्यापार मार्ग राजस्थान से गुजरता था, उसका नाम क्या था?
explanation_en: The Silk Road was an ancient trade route that passed through Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: सिल्क रोड प्राचीन व्यापार मार्ग था जो राजस्थान से गुजरता था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: Who was the famous Jain saint of ancient Rajasthan?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान के प्रसिद्ध जैन संत कौन थे?
explanation_en: Parshvanatha was a famous Jain saint of ancient Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: पार्श्वनाथ प्राचीन राजस्थान के प्रसिद्ध जैन संत थे।
